portfolioComparisonTypes.description: Tree of PortfolioComparisonType to define which analyses and sub-analyses (for drill-down) should be performed}

tempPortfolioWithPositions.description: Temporary portfolio with positions as base of the comparison analysis

options.description: options for the requested portfolio optimization

tradeAccount.description: Account identifier (positionId) from which liquidity should be taken

exposures.description: Riskfactor exposures (instrument ID is risk factor ID)

details.description: Instrument risk exposures (instrument ID is {@link Instrument#instrumentId})

risk.description: Risk value (volatility) in percent (0.1 means 10%) for implemented, current, and target(SAA/TAA) portfolio

var.description: Risk value (VaR) in percent (0.1 means 10%) for implemented, current, and target(SAA/TAA) portfolio

cvar.description: Risk value (CVaR) in percent (0.1 means 10%) for implemented, current, and target(SAA/TAA) portfolio

expectedReturn.description: Expected return value in percent (0.1 means 10%) for implemented, current, and target(SAA/TAA) portfolio

contributions.description: Expected return value in percent (0.1 means 10%) for implemented, current, and target(SAA/TAA) portfolio

overridingRestrictionId.description: the overriding restriction; is null in case of disabling a bank restriction

maxRegrouping.description: maximum amount allowed to be reallocated in portfolio currency

universeId.description: Id of universe to use for optimization

portfolioRisk.description: Contains risk (vola, var, cvar) values for current, implemented and target portfolio and risk contributions of the portfolio

restrictionCheck.description: Contains summarized result of restriction checks

portfolioExposures.description: Contains portfolio exposures to risk factors

portfolioVersionNames.description: Aligned list to portfolioAnalyses which specifies the version (implemented/current/target) of the analysis

portfolioAnalyses.description: Aligned list to portfolioAnalyses which specifies the version (implemented/current/target) of the analysis

noRiskData.description: Indicates whether risk data is available or not. True if risk data is missing

universe.description: Universe of the positions instrument. Is null if no instrument is assigned to position or if no universe is defined for instrument

outOfUniverse.description: Indicates whether the positions instrument is classified as out of universe, whereas value is true, if the instrument is classified as out of universe. Is false if no instrument is assigned to position.

recommendationLabel.description: Label of the bank recommendation of the positions instrument. Indicates recommended action and/or detailed information about the reasoning to include the position

contributionToPortfolio.description: contribution of the positions affected by this restriction to the portfolio (0.2 means 20%)

infeasibleRestrictionId.description: id of the restriction causing an infeasible problem

message.description: Message containing detail information about errors during optimization

positionCharacteristicsMap.description: Collection of positions, extended with position specific characteristics

value.description: Value of portfolio position in instrument

marketPrc.description: Product Risk Classification for instrument - Market Risk portion

liquidityPrc.description: Product Risk Classification for instrument - Liquidity Risk portion

creditPrc.description: Product Risk Classification for instrument - Credit Risk portion

contribution.description: Risk contribution of instrument in percent (0.5 means 50%)
